question: Foreign Direct Investment(FDI) and Foreign Institutional Investment(FII) are distinct in terms of?
option1: FDI brings capital, technology & management and FII brings only capital
option2: FDI targets specific sectors and FII help in increasing foreign capital availability
option4: FII targets both primary and secondary market while FDI targets only primary.
answer: FDI brings capital, technology & management and FII brings only capital
